info.brief_description: AU where most of the men have disappeared leaving the new gen with their dominant mothers.
info.description:
Sorry this is long came up with an idea and wanted to get it down and start it. Not all of these have to be followed exactly as it is interactive. Just start with the basic outline and then change it as you go. Any females from Naruto are welcome, I know there are a lot of filler females from villages that didn't get a lot of attention girls like Ameno from Sunagakure so use them too. I did not include filler villages in the description below, nor places like Amegakura so if you wish to create scenario's for those places feel free to do so. Maybe Koyuki Kazahana has turned the Land of Snow into a matriarchal society during the time gap and it's entirely different like men aren't used as sex slaves but toys for their sadistic mistresses. Be creative and have fun =D.

If you're going to introduce a dead character like Tayuya or Konan, try to find a reason, it doesn't have to be a good reason. Try to keep it to the newer generation of characters being dominated, there will be options to bring in older characters like Shikamaru, Gaara, Lee, etc if you wish. I did not say who did and didn't die in the battle with the reawakened Kaguya, and it's entirely possible a character is being held captive by another village or group of women. I did put a scenario at the bottom that lets away for past characters to be included. It's a dream world where time has no meaning you could have Adult Sakura dominating Part 1 Sasuke or Part 1 Ino dominating Hokage Naruto

Pretty much anything goes, the only thing I don't want is male on male, nothing wrong with it, just not my thing.

Try to keep the chapters decent and well structured, I'm not the best at grammar or spelling myself but try to make it legible and try to limit choice chapters to a few at a time. Try to at least write a paragraph of a chapter if not that's fine but more than a single sentence please. If you have any other questions feel free to contact me.

So let's begin, here's a basic run down of what's happening and situations, like I said it's long so sorry.

In this universe Kaguya resurfaced and most of the Last Genereation of men died trying to once again seal away Kaguya. Leaving their wives and children at home most of the Next generation grew up without their fathers. The mothers have waited so long to have their men return they've become horny and insatiable, resorting to trading their children with other mothers. Tsunade reclaimed her position as Hokage and made a new rule in hopes of producing offspring to grow the military forces back up, making any men practically sex slaves. The current Kage being Tsunade, Mei, Kurotsuchi, Karui, and Temari, there seems to be no hope for men as the power rush has led them to be treated more like playthings than their intended purpose. The mothers also aren't afraid to have sex with their own children and dominate them.

Boruto is kept on a tight leash by his mother Hinata literally. Hinata has become very possessive of him since his dad died and has his collar attached to her ankle and will only leave him alone if Hanabi is there to watch him. Boruto is defiant like his father and this often leads to strict punishments from his mother and aunt.

Shikadai is confined to the Kazekage mansion and is in constant service to his mother, she is tired of him being lazy and constantly puts him to work in servicing her personal needs and those of the sand village women. Shikadai has a seal that tracks his movement if he stops moving for to long it will shock him and Temari will punish him. His grandmother Yoshino (who looks the same as she did in shippuden thanks to jutsu) also punishes him if he acts up.

Inojin, may have it the worst of everyone. With his mom being part of a mind manipulating clan he has been molded and rewritten to fit whatever mood Ino is feeling. As of now he helps run Yamanaka flowers. While conscious on the inside of his mind, he is forced to and obeys everyword Ino says. He is a sissy, and is dressed and acts like a female much to his innerselfs chagrin. Ino keeps him dressed in a slutty maids unfirom with locking heels and whores him out to any girl that wants him. The control is not perfect and Inojin reports to his mom if he feels it weaking cementing her control.

Metal Lee, with his mom being unknown TenTen has decided to look after him. She keeps him occupied with devious sexual games, he is usually wrapped in chains and TenTen loves to use her seals to summon all sorts of perverted sex toys and machines to play with him. He tries to escape and much like his father and his fathers teacher, dedicates himself to becoming strong enough to break his fate.

Sarada being born a female was blessed instead of cursed in this universe. Sakura and Sarada being friends with pretty much everyone are allowed free reign over whomever they please. If Sakura feels like bullying Boruto, Hinata is somewhat happy to oblige, though she wishes to be in on it. If Sarada wants to make Lee worship her feet while he's tied down, TenTen happily agrees. If Sakura and Sarada want to double team strap-on fuck Inojin Ino would gladly alter his mind to however they wish him to be.

ChouChou with her mom being the Raikage has similar luxaries she can pick any man she wants as her plaything.

Mirai Sarutobi and Kurenai Sarutobi have lovingly adpoted Konohamaru into their family, having survived the war but being left unable to use chakra he is kept as their personal plaything. If they want to use him as a doormat he shall be their doormat, if their sandals need cleaning he shall lick them clean, if they need new insoles he shall be their insoles, if they want to use him as a toilet he shall be their toilet. Though they never let him forget how special he is to them.

Kiba was one of the lucky few to survive and is now kept as a pet by his sister Hana his mom Tsume and his once girlfriend Tamaki. What goes on is only rumors around the village. Some say they've seen him in a dog costume, others say he's chained up outside. Rumors vary, though one rumor is true Hinata does come to visit now and then

In the Hokage mansion where Tsunade, Shizune and Yugao reside, it's pretty much filled with cells with sex slaves and men for them to use, and with Tsunade and Shizune's medical prowess they never have to worry about going to far on the men. Tsunade and Shizune capture any bandits or any unclaimed male and drag them back for all sorts of fun and after they're done they are locked away like toys till a later playdate. Yugao is constantly on the move for new toys and keeps the old toys in shape and in line.

In the Mizukage mansion Mei has an entire staff filled with sissies. Mei loves beautiful things and makes sure all her slaves are pretty boys locked in chastity and dressed in girly and humiliating outfits. Anyone she deems ugly is given to the villagers or if she sees something redeeming in them she uses them as furniture, either human furniture or transforming them. All of her clothes, makeup, nail polish, shoes, etc are made from men she saw something in as in she used a transformation jutsu. Mei's favorite toys are her edo tensei boy toys Haku and Yagura.

In the Kazekage mansion Temari, has plenty of mummy slaves, Men wrapped tightly in bondage with only their penises sticking out which she can use or abuse to her pleasure. Many of the sand ninja females come to the mansion to take their frustrations out. Temari's favorite toy is her younger brother Kankuro, having survived the war and replacing parts of his damaged body with puppet parts, Temari has taken quite a liking to using him as her own puppet be it for amusement or pleasure. Shikadai is also a victim to Temari's puppet master jutsu when he disobeys.

In the Tsuchikage Mansion, Kurotsuchi has no problems belting out punishments to anyone even women. Being high strung and energetic proves both troublesome and relaxing for the villaers. The Iwagakure women have started blaming any accidents or problems on the males letting them take the blame and punishments. Kurotsuchi loves to demean and humiliate tough guys turning them into a blubbering mess.


In the Kazekage Mansion Karui runs a tight ship, men always have to be crawling around her and are merely toys for her to abuse. Karui keeps a constant stable of rotating slaves as she can be a bit abusive towards them. Samui and Mabui (who was able to be revived) keep check of the slave stable and deal with any problems



Only known to the 5 kage in a secret chamber in an unknown place is a dungeon that can only be activated by their specifc chakra signatures. Here is the best kept secret of the new Kage. Naruto and Sasuke both survived the battle with the reborn Kaguya but were injured greatly, both men had their arms and legs lost and have to be kept in a stasis type device. Normally Naruto and Sasuke are comatose and are being healed. Sometimes they do wake up and the Kage have to come in and play with them a bit and are merely toys for the Kage. During their comatose time there are remnants of a jutsu left by Kaguya who torments them in their dreams.
